name: Lycan Idle Deckbuilder
description:
Full-screen recommended.

At night, the cursed and blighted gather in the forest and transform.  As their leader, build up your forces and overrun the forest on the night of the full moon.

Use your mouse to drag cards from your hand into the play area and form the purchase area to the play area.

I decided I wanted to make a werewolf deckbuilder for the Lunar New Year Game Jam 2020.  Not only did my multiplayer social lying designs not work, but I only got one player working after a week and a half.  I considered having some adversary, but it was easier...er...it was an opportunity to take on the idle/incremental genre.

Seriously though, I found this design to be interesting and I'd like to take this design on again with a clean project and more time to work.
